ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry but if someone wants to heal someone is there peroggative and doesnt make them a bad Rplayer...grow up and get a new life you are far too serious
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry but if someone wants to heal someone is there peroggative and doesnt
make them a bad Rplayer...grow up and get a new life you are far too serious
methinks..
----- Original Message -----
From: The Scotts <jtscott@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, August 22, 1999 3:28 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Behaviour


> From: "The Scotts" <jtscott@...>
>
> Listen whether you RP or not if you come up to a player who does and
> they do not want your help becuase their diety (exp: your Rodcet Nife>they
> are Plaguae Bringer) then do not help them especially dont be an asshole
and
> give them every buff you have or heal them to the max. Just becuase you
> don't RP dont ruin the enviroment for those that do.
> -----Original Message-----
> From: AsmodeusDP@... <AsmodeusDP@...>
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Date: Friday, August 20, 1999 11:01 PM
> Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Behaviour
>
>
> >From: AsmodeusDP@...
> >
> >I'm new to this mail list, and thought I would introduce myself with a
> topic
> >to discuss. I've often wondered what exactly it means to be a cleric in
> >Norrath. My personal opinion is that we should always be merciful to
those
> >around us, and help in any way we can. Even if to heal someone we don't
> even
> >know completely depletes our mana. What do you think of this?
> >
> >
> >Nofur<Pact of Aegis> of Karana
